00039 void Zone_EF_axi::calculer_Bij_gen(DoubleTab& bij)
00040 {
00041   const IntTab& les_elems=zone().les_elems() ;
00042   int nbsom_face=nb_som_face();
00043   int nbelem=nb_elem_tot();
00044   int nbsom_elem=zone().nb_som_elem();
00045   const IntTab& elemfaces=elem_faces_;
00046   int nbface_elem=zone().nb_faces_elem();
00047 
00048   const DoubleTab& les_coords = domaine_axi().coord_sommets();
00049 
00050   const DoubleVect& surf = face_surfaces();
00051 
00052   for (int elem=0; elem<nbelem; elem++)
00053     {
00054       double x0 = origine_repere_(elem,0);
00055       double y0 = origine_repere_(elem,1);
00056 
00057       for (int i=0; i<nbsom_elem; i++)
00058         {
00059 // on cherche les faces contribuantes ,ce n'est pas optimal
00060           for (int f=0; f<nbface_elem; f++)
00061             {
00062               int face=elemfaces(elem,f);
00063               for (int s=0; s<nbsom_face; s++)
00064                 {
00065 // on cherche les faces contribuantes ,ce n'est pas optimal
00066                   if (face_sommets_(face,s)==les_elems(elem,i))
00067                     {
00068                       double x1 = les_coords(les_elems(elem,0),0);
00069                       double x2 = les_coords(les_elems(elem,1),0);
00070                       double y1 = les_coords(les_elems(elem,0),1);
00071                       double y2 = les_coords(les_elems(elem,1),1);
00072 
00073                       double r1 = sqrt((x1-x0)*(x1-x0)+(y1-y0)*(y1-y0));
00074                       double r2 = sqrt((x2-x0)*(x2-x0)+(y2-y0)*(y2-y0));
00075 
00076                       for (int j=0; j<dimension; j++)
00077                         {
00078                           if (surf(face)>0)
00079                             bij(elem,i,j)+=face_normales(face,j)*oriente_normale(face,elem)*(r1+r2)*M_PI/surf(face);
00080                           else
00081                             bij(elem,i,j)+=face_normales(face,j)*oriente_normale(face,elem)*(r1+r2)*M_PI;
00082                         }
00083                     }
00084                 }
00085             }
00086         }
00087     }
00088 }
00089 
00090 void Zone_EF_axi::calculer_IPhi()
00091 {
00092   int nbelem=zone().nb_elem();
00093   int nb_som_elem=zone().nb_som_elem();
00094   assert(nb_som_elem==2);
00095 
00096   IPhi_.resize(nbelem,nb_som_elem);
00097   domaine_axi().creer_tableau_elements(IPhi_);
00098 // Scatter::creer_tableau_distribue(zone().domaine(), Joint::ELEMENT, IPhi_);
00099   IPhi_thilde_=IPhi_;
00100 
00101   const IntTab& les_elems=zone().les_elems() ;
00102 
00103   const DoubleTab& les_coords = domaine_axi().coord_sommets();
00104 
00105   for (int elem=0; elem<nbelem; elem++)
00106     {
00107       double x1 = les_coords(les_elems(elem,0),0);
00108       double x2 = les_coords(les_elems(elem,1),0);
00109       double y1 = les_coords(les_elems(elem,0),1);
00110       double y2 = les_coords(les_elems(elem,1),1);
00111 
00112       double x0 = origine_repere_(elem,0);
00113       double y0 = origine_repere_(elem,1);
00114 
00115       double r1 = sqrt((x1-x0)*(x1-x0)+(y1-y0)*(y1-y0));
00116       double r2 = sqrt((x2-x0)*(x2-x0)+(y2-y0)*(y2-y0));
00117       IPhi_(elem,0) = (M_PI/3.)*(r2*r2+r1*r2-2.*r1*r1);
00118       IPhi_(elem,1) = (M_PI/3.)*(2.*r2*r2-r1*r2-r1*r1);
00119 
00120       for (int s=0; s<nb_som_elem; s++)
00121         IPhi_thilde_(elem,s)=IPhi_(elem,s)*porosite_elem_(elem);
00122     }
00123 
00124   IPhi_.echange_espace_virtuel();
00125   IPhi_thilde_.echange_espace_virtuel();
00126 }
00127 
00128 void Zone_EF_axi::remplir_tableau_origine()
00129 {
00130   DomaineAxi1d& domax = domaine_axi();
00131   const Champ& orig = domax.champ_origine();
00132 
00133   origine_repere_.resize(0,Objet_U::dimension-1);
00134   domax.creer_tableau_elements(origine_repere_);
00135 
00136   if (orig.non_nul())
00137     {
00138       const DoubleTab& positions = xp();
00139 
00140       IntVect les_polys(nb_elem());
00141       for(int e = 0; e < nb_elem(); e++)
00142         les_polys(e) = e;
00143 
00144       orig->valeur_aux_elems(positions, les_polys, origine_repere_);
00145     }
00146   else
00147     origine_repere_=0.;
00148 
00149   domax.associer_origine_repere(origine_repere_);
00150 }
00151 
00152 void Zone_EF_axi::verifie_compatibilite_domaine()
00153 {
00154   if (!zone().domaine().Axi1d())
00155     {
00156       Cerr << "*****************************************************************************" << finl;
00157       Cerr << " Error in " << que_suis_je() << " : the type of domain " << zone().domaine().que_suis_je();
00158       Cerr << " is not compatible" << finl;
00159       Cerr << " with the discretisation EF_axi. " << finl;
00160       Cerr << " Please use the discretization EF or define a domain of type DomaineAxi1d." << finl;
00161       Cerr << "*****************************************************************************" << finl;
00162       Process::exit();
00163     }
00164 }
00165 
00166 void Zone_EF_axi::discretiser()
00167 {
00168 
00169   verifie_compatibilite_domaine();
00170   typer_elem(zone());
00171   remplir_tableau_origine();
00172   Zone_EF::discretiser();
00173 }

00175 const DomaineAxi1d& Zone_EF_axi::domaine_axi() const
00176 {
00177   return ref_cast(DomaineAxi1d,zone().domaine());
00178 }

00180 DomaineAxi1d& Zone_EF_axi::domaine_axi()

00182   return ref_cast(DomaineAxi1d,zone().domaine());
